bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, smooth weld, fully manipulated tubing, semi-compact design, integrated headset, internal cable routing, rack and fender fittings

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon legs, alloy crown/steerer, low-rider rack/fender fittings
1-1/8" sealed Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated w/ headset, 20mm alloy cone spacer, w/ 20mm of spacers
Specialized EliteSet, 3D forged alloy, 12-degree, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt, 31.8mm clamp
Specialized TriCross wrap w/ 2.5 gel pads
New TriCross Comp secondary brake levers
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
Specialized Borough CX Armadillo Elite, 120 TPI, aramid bead, 700x32c
Specialized Borough CX Armadillo Elite, 120 TPI, aramid bead, 700x32c
chainstay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owner's manual
